artefact: Hackney carriage licence (England, Scotland and Wales)

artefact.alternative_title: Hackney carriage driver (taxi) licence (England, Scotland & Wales)
artefact.overview: You need a licence to operate as a hackney carriage
artefact.licence_short_description: You need a licence to operate as a hackney carriage.
artefact.licence_overview:
If you're a hackney carriage (taxicab) driver in England (excluding London), Scotland and Wales you need a licence from the local council. 

Conditions of your licence depend on your local council.

###Horse and carriage

If you're using a horse and carriage to carry paying passengers, you'll also need a hackney carriage (taxicab) licence from the local council.
